title: Frontend Development
description: Modern, responsive web interfaces using React, Vue, and Angular frameworks with emphasis on user experience and performance.
details: Comprehensive frontend development services including responsive design, single-page applications, progressive web apps, and modern JavaScript frameworks. Expertise in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+, TypeScript, and popular libraries like React, Vue.js, and Angular.

title: Backend Development
description: Robust server-side solutions with Node.js, Express, and database integration for scalable web applications.
details: Full-stack backend development including RESTful APIs, microservices architecture, database design and optimization, authentication systems, and cloud deployment. Proficient in Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, MySQL, and cloud platforms like AWS and Azure.

title: Game Programming
description: Interactive game development using Unity and Unreal Engine with focus on gameplay mechanics and performance optimization.
details: Professional game development services including gameplay programming, physics simulation, AI systems, procedural generation, and cross-platform deployment. Specialized in Unity3D, C#, game optimization, and immersive user experiences.

title: UI/UX Design
description: User-centered design solutions that balance aesthetics with functionality for optimal user engagement.
details: Complete UI/UX design services including user research, wireframing, prototyping, visual design, and usability testing. Focus on creating intuitive interfaces that enhance user experience while meeting business objectives.

title: Agile Development
description: Efficient project management and development processes using Agile methodologies for timely delivery.
details: Agile project management and development consultation including sprint planning, scrum implementation, continuous integration/deployment, and team collaboration strategies. Experienced in Jira, Git workflows, and DevOps practices.
